nl: Change the default value of parameter keepSession in tusclasesparticulares_login to false.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Function)
WHERE toLower(f.name) CONTAINS 'tusclasesparticulares_login'
MATCH (f)-[:HAS_PARAMETER]->(p:Parameter {name: 'keepSession'})
SET p.default = false
RETURN f, p;

nl: Add a parameter named maxCharacters (type: number, default: 3000) to the function exa-search-crawling_exa.
Remove the parameter numResults from the function exa-search-company_research_exa
